info.title: Channel 4 API
info.description: This is the place to come for all the technical details you need to power your applications with Channel 4's deep programmes data.

get.description:
Information of daily broadcast content available on 4oD, according to 
  broadcast date

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/4od/episode-list/date/[yyyy]/[mm]/[dd].atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/4od/episode-list/date/2010/11/28.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Information of the most popular content available on 4oD, according to user 
  data driven.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/4od/episode-list/popular.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/4od/episode-list/popular.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

A feed containing metadata about short-form content relating to 4oD Episodes 
  recently added to 4oD based on linear transmission. The entries for the 
  Clips Landing Feed contain references to each short-form asset. It will 
  return up to 20 entries.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/4od/recently-added/videos.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/4od/episode-list/videos.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

A feed containing all available on-demand long-form content for a specified 
  brand. The entries for the 4oD feed contain references to each long-form 
  asset for a brand, ordered by series number and episode number.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/[brand-web-safe-title]/4od.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/the-it-crowd/4od.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists Channel 4 programmes alphabetically from A to Z, providing the same 
  functionality and information as is available in the A to Z section of the 
  Channel 4 Programmes page, http://www.channel4.com/programmes.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/atoz.atom

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/atoz.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists Channel 4 programmes whose names begin with the associated letter.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/atoz/start_letter.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/atoz/a.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists Channel 4 programmes whose names begin with the associated letter.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/atoz/start_letter/page-{pageno}.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/atoz/a.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

The basis for all brand information

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brand-web-safe-title.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/the-it-crowd.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

This feed contains metadata about upcoming electronic programme guide (EPG) 
  information for a brand. The entry details upcoming transmission slots for 
  this brand.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brand-web-safe-title/epg.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/the-simpsons/epg.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

A feed containing metadata about all series for a specified brand. The 
  entries in this feed contain references to each of the series (where 
  metadata has been published), with some convenient links.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brand-web-safe-title/episode-guide.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/father-ted/episode-guide.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

A feed containing metadata about all the episodes for a specific series. The 
  entries in this feed contain references to each of the episodes (where 
  metadata has been published), with some convenient links.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brand-web-safe-title/episode-guide/series-series_number.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/chelmsford-123/episode-guide/series-1.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

A feed containing metadata about a specified episode. (This feed does not 
  contain any entries and only contains a feed element regarding this 
  episode.)

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brand-web-safe-title/episode-guide/series-series_number/episode-episode_number.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/the-it-crowd/episode-guide/series-1/episode-1.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

A feed containing metadata about all the short-form (clip) videos. The clips 
  feed can be accessed at different levels: the content is then filtered 
  depending on the level, but the structure is identical.When accessed: from 
  the top, the feed contains all the clips for the brand;  at series level, 
  the feed contains only clips from the series; and  at episode level, the 
  feed contains only clips for the episode (and is very unlikely to require 
  pagination). The entries for the Clips Landing Feed contain references to 
  each short-form asset.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brand-web-safe-title/videos/all.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/peep-show/videos.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
get.summary: Clips Landing Feed Brand Series and Episode Levels

get.description:
A feed containing metadata about all the short-form (clip) videos. The clips 
  feed can be accessed at different levels: the content is then filtered 
  depending on the level, but the structure is identical.When accessed: from 
  the top, the feed contains all the clips for the brand;  at series level, 
  the feed contains only clips from the series; and  at episode level, the 
  feed contains only clips for the episode (and is very unlikely to require 
  pagination). The entries for the Clips Landing Feed contain references to 
  each short-form asset.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brand-web-safe-title/videos/series-SERIES_SEQUENCE_NUMBER.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/peep-show/videos.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
get.summary: Clips Landing Feed Brand Series and Episode Levels(2)

get.description:
A feed containing metadata about all the short-form (clip) videos. The clips 
  feed can be accessed at different levels: the content is then filtered 
  depending on the level, but the structure is identical.When accessed: from 
  the top, the feed contains all the clips for the brand;  at series level, 
  the feed contains only clips from the series; and  at episode level, the 
  feed contains only clips for the episode (and is very unlikely to require 
  pagination). The entries for the Clips Landing Feed contain references to 
  each short-form asset.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brand-web-safe-title/videos/series-SERIES_SEQUENCE_NUMBER/episode-EPISODE_SEQUENCE_NUMBER.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/peep-show/videos.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
get.summary: Clips Landing Feed Brand Series and Episode Levels(3)

get.description:
A feed containing metadata about a single short-form video (clip).

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brand-web-safe-title/videos/clip-asset-id.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/the-it-crowd/videos/TCGS_CLIP_0000001015.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes available on 4oD.  By default, the programmes 
  are listed by title in alphabetical order (case unsensitive).

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brands/4od.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brands/4od.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes available on 4oD.  By default, the programmes 
  are listed by title in alphabetical order (case unsensitive).

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brands/4od/page-{pageno}.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brands/4od.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes available on 4oD by popularity considering 
  the data gathered within the last 7 days.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brands/4od/popular.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brands/4od/popular.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes available on 4oD by popularity considering 
  the data gathered within the last 7 days.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brands/4od/popular/page-{pageno}.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brands/4od/popular.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes by popularity considering the data gathered 
  within the last 7 days.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brands/popular.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brands/popular.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes by popularity considering the data gathered 
  within the last 7 days.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brands/popular/page-{pageno}.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/brands/popular.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists Channel 4 programmes by category (/ tag).

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes associated with the specified category (tag).  
  By default, the programmes are listed in order of Transmission (TX) Date, 
  with the most-recently-transmitted programmes listed first.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/animals.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes associated with the specified category (tag).  
  By default, the programmes are listed in order of Transmission (TX) Date, 
  with the most-recently-transmitted programmes listed first.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/channel/[channel].atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/animals.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes associated with the specified category (tag).  
  By default, the programmes are listed in order of Transmission (TX) Date, 
  with the most-recently-transmitted programmes listed first.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/derived/ad.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/animals.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes associated with the specified category (tag).  
  By default, the programmes are listed in order of Transmission (TX) Date, 
  with the most-recently-transmitted programmes listed first.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/page-{pageno}.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/animals.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4oD programmes associated with the specified category 
  (tag).By default, the programmes are listed in order of Transmission (TX) 
  Date, with the most-recently-transmitted programmes listed first.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/4od.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/animals/4oD.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4oD programmes associated with the specified category 
  (tag).By default, the programmes are listed in order of Transmission (TX) 
  Date, with the most-recently-transmitted programmes listed first.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/channel/[channel]/4od.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/animals/4oD.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4oD programmes associated with the specified category 
  (tag).By default, the programmes are listed in order of Transmission (TX) 
  Date, with the most-recently-transmitted programmes listed first.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/derived/ad/4od.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/animals/4oD.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4oD programmes associated with the specified category 
  (tag).By default, the programmes are listed in order of Transmission (TX) 
  Date, with the most-recently-transmitted programmes listed first.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/4od/page-{pageno}.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/animals/4oD.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4oD most popular brands for the given category within the 
  last 7 days, in order of popularity.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/4od/popular.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/comedy/4od/popular.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4oD most popular brands for the given category within the 
  last 7 days, in order of popularity.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/popular.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/comedy/4od/popular.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4oD most popular brands for the given category within the 
  last 7 days, in order of popularity.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/channel/[channel]/4od/popular.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/comedy/4od/popular.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4oD most popular brands for the given category within the 
  last 7 days, in order of popularity.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/derived/ad/4od/popular.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/comedy/4od/popular.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4oD most popular brands for the given category within the 
  last 7 days, in order of popularity.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/4od/popular/page-{pageno}.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/comedy/4od/popular.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4oD programmes associated with the specified category 
  (tag), alphanumerically in order of Title.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/4od/title.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/religion-and-belief/4oD/title.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4oD programmes associated with the specified category 
  (tag), alphanumerically in order of Title.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/channel/[channel]/4od/title.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/religion-and-belief/4oD/title.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4oD programmes associated with the specified category 
  (tag), alphanumerically in order of Title.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/derived/ad/4od/title.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/religion-and-belief/4oD/title.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4oD programmes associated with the specified category 
  (tag), alphanumerically in order of Title.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/4od/title/page-{pageno}.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/religion-and-belief/4oD/title.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes associated with the specified category (tag), 
  alphanumerically in order of Title.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/title.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/history/title.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes associated with the specified category (tag), 
  alphanumerically in order of Title.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/channel/[channel]/title.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/history/title.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes associated with the specified category (tag), 
  alphanumerically in order of Title.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/derived/ad/title.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/history/title.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes associated with the specified category (tag), 
  alphanumerically in order of Title.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/category/title/page-{pageno}.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/categories/history/title.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Collections are editorially controlled groups of brands, series, episodes or 
  other collections used for promotion and discovery of content. A SIMPLE 
  collection can contain an assortment of Brands, Series, Episodes or Freeform 
  items. A GROUP collection contains other collections.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/collections/collection_name/4od.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/collections/4od-home-promo/4od.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Collections are editorially controlled groups of brands, series, episodes or 
  other collections used for promotion and discovery of content. A SIMPLE 
  collection can contain an assortment of Brands, Series, Episodes or Freeform 
  items. A GROUP collection contains other collections.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/collections/collection_name.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/collections/4od-home-promo/4od.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

The Flattened Collections Feed is only applicable for GROUP collections and 
  its purpose is mainly return 3 items (BRAND, SERIES or EPSIODE) of each of 
  the simple collections assigned to the GROUP.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/collections/collection_name/flattened/4od.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/collections/4od-home-promo/flattened/4od.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

The Flattened Collections Feed is only applicable for GROUP collections and 
  its purpose is mainly return 3 items (BRAND, SERIES or EPSIODE) of each of 
  the simple collections assigned to the GROUP.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/collections/collection_name/flattened.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/collections/4od-home-promo/flattened/4od.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Coming Soon feed display a list of episodes coming soon to linear TV so that 
  I can promote new Channel 4 content.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/coming-soon.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/coming-soon.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Coming Soon feed display a list of episodes coming soon to linear TV so that 
  I can promote new Channel 4 content.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/coming-soon/[category].atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/coming-soon.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

A feed containing all long-form content currently or previously available 
  for a specified Programme Id. The entries for the Programme feed contain 
  references to long-form assets for each platform.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/programme/[programme-id].atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/programme/33881-001/4od.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes where title (brand name) matching the search 
  term. Matches are made from the beginning of individual words in the title.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/search.atom?q=search-term&apikey=xxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/search.atom?q=the+it+crowd&xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes where title (brand name) matching the search 
  term. Matches are made from the beginning of individual words in the title.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/search/search-term.atom?apikey=xxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/search.atom?q=the+it+crowd&xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Lists all Channel 4 programmes where title (brand name) matching the search 
  term. Matches are made from the beginning of individual words in the title.

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/search/page-{pageno}.atom?q=search-term&apikey=xxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/search.atom?q=the+it+crowd&xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

EPG Information of daily broadcast content aired per channels, according to 
  broadcast date

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/tv-listings/daily/[yyyy]/[mm]/[dd].atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/tv-listings/daily/2010/11/28.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

EPG Information of daily broadcast content aired per channels, according to 
  broadcast date

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/tv-listings/daily/[yyyy]/[mm]/[dd]/[channel].atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

  http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/tv-listings/daily/2010/11/28.atom?xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

link@previous.description: Link to previous day's page / feed (if available)

link@next.description: Link to next day's page / feed (if available)

generator.description: Identifies the agent used to generate the feed

generator@version.description: Identifies the version of the agent used to generate the feed

dc:relation.platformClientVersion.description: Identifies the version of the specified platform client application compatible with this feed.

link@alternate.description: URL to HTML version, i.e., player page

dc:relation.BrandFlattened.description: Boolean indicating whether there is no Series -> Episode structure in this brand ("false" indicating that there is such a structure)

dc:relation.BrandWebSafeTitle.description: Title of the brand safe for web linking (no whitespaces, no special chars...)

dc:relation.ProgrammeType.description: Displays metadata code (as detailed in the following table) in a meaningful way on the application according to the specified programme type.

dc:relation.4oDSeriesCount.description: Number of available 4oD series for this Brand

dc:relation.4oDProgrammeCount.description: Number of available brands in this category beginning with this letter (4oD only)

dc:relation.New4oDSeriesAvailable.description: Flags that notifies clients when a Brand contains NEW series.

fh:complete.description: Presence of this element indicates no pagination

dc:relation.AllProgrammeCount.description: Number of available brands in this category beginning with this letter (all programmes)

link@related (Episode Guide).description: URL to Episode Guide feed, if available

link@related (Clips).description: URL to short-form video feed for this episode, if available

category (secondary).description: Secondary category (brand may have any number)

dc:relation.comingSoonTo4oD.description: If the brand is coming to be available on 4oD soon this empty element should be included.

link@related (4oD Episode).description: URL to HTML version of 4oD page for full episode, if available

dc:relation.firstTXDate.description: Date of first broadcast (optional). This is based on EPG or, when EPG data is not available for the episode, it can be set editorially (significant date)

dc:relation.firstTXChannel.description: First TX channel information for this episode

dc:relation.lastTXDate.description: Date of last broadcast (optional). This is based on EPG ignoring repeats and giving preference to the channel that the brand is primarily targeted at (preferred channel)

dc:relation.lastTXChannel.description: Channel of last broadcast (optional). This is based on EPG ignoring repeats and giving preference to the channel that the brand is primarily targeted at (preferred channel)

dc:relation.SeriesNumber.description: The series to which this episode belongs

dc:relation.EpisodeNumber.description: The episode number within the series

dc:relation.Sharable.description: Boolean value indicating if clips for this brand are sharable

media:player.description: URL to media-player version of episode

media:thumbnail.description: URL to medium-sized image of this episode

media:rating.description: Flag to show whether episode is suitable for adults only ("adult") or for all viewers ("nonadult")

media:restriction.description: Restriction flag ("allow") and list of country or state codes where episode is accessible to website users

media:rights.description: Status of media rights under which Channel 4 provides episode content

media:category.description: Defines the type of short-form item. Its value can be one of the next: EXTRACT, PREVIEW, EXTRA, TRAILER

media:player.description: URL to media-player version of episode

media:thumbnail.description: URL to medium-sized image of this episode

media:rating.description: Flag to show whether episode is suitable for adults only ("adult") or for all viewers ("nonadult")

media:restriction.description: Restriction flag ("allow") and list of country or state codes where episode is accessible to website users

media:rights.description: Status of media rights under which Channel 4 provides episode content

dc:relation.deliveryType.description: Indicates STREAMING or FOR DOWNLOAD content

dcterms:available.description: Start date, end date and date/time format for the period of time when episode is available.  (This feed would not be available if the current date is outside the start and end dates.)

dc:relation.AgeRating.description: Channel 4-specific recommended lower age-limit for viewers (0, 16 or 18)

dc:relation.Guidance.description: Channel 4-specific warning text about specific disturbing content, adult humour, nudity, etc., if applicable

dc:relation.Subtitles.description: Boolean indicating if subtitles are available for this episode

dc:relation.AudioDescription.description: Boolean indicating if an audio description is available for this episode

dc:relation.Duration.description: Length in minutes and seconds - does not include ad breaks

dcterms:available.description: Start date, end date and date/time format for the period of time when episode is available.  (This feed would not be available if the current date is outside the start and end dates.)

dc:relation.AgeRating.description: Channel 4-specific recommended lower age-limit for viewers (0, 16 or 18)

dc:relation.Guidance.description: Channel 4-specific warning text about specific disturbing content, adult humour, nudity, etc., if applicable

dc:relation.Duration.description: Length in minutes and seconds - does not include ad breaks

dc:relation.ExternalVideoId.description: Clip Asset_id value from the Clip table (a.k.a. Brightcode id).

dc:relation.CategoryType.description: Type to which the category belongs (if applicable).(Valid values are 'Channel', 'Display' or 'None'.)

dc:relation.CategoryOrder.description: Enumerated order of category within its type(e.g., 'Channel' might have Food=1, More4=2, etc.)(Appears in feed only if CategoryType<>'None'.)

Entry Elements.description: Element Description Example Value id ID containing Brand Web Safe Name tag:www.channel4.com,2009:/brand/inside-natures-giants title Programme's Brand Name Inside Nature's Giants summary Synopsis of this brand The award-winning series that gets under the skin of the largest animals on the planet. Most wildlife documentaries show how animals behave, but by exploring their anatomy, Inside Nature's Giants reveals how these creatures really work. updated Date and time element last updated 2010-10-18T10:08:44.295Z dc:relation.sortLetter  Starting letter for this programme I dc:relation.ProgrammeType  Displays metadata code (as detailed in the following table) in a meaningful way on the application according to the specified programme type. SSU dc:date.TXDate  Transmission date of the programme 2010-10-18T10:30:00.000Z media:content / media:thumbnail URL to medium-sized image of this brand url="http://www.channel4.com/assets/programmes/images/inside-natures-giants/7eb0ec03-1321-4532-bf51-cb2af0d9d528_145x82.jpg" height="82" width="145" link@alternate URL to HTML version of brand http://www.channel4.com/programmes/inside-natures-giants link@self URL to the Channel 4 XML feed for this brand http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/inside-natures-giants.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx link@related (Official Site) URL to the brand's official site, if available link@related (4oD) URL to 4oD feed, if available (self-referential in 4oD feeds) http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/inside-natures-giants/4od.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx link@related (Clips) URL to short-form video feed, if available http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/inside-natures-giants/video.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx link@related (Episode Guide) URL to Episode Guide feed, if available http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/inside-natures-giants/episode-guide.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

media:thumbnail.description: URL to medium-sized image of this episode

Link@Related title=\"4oD\".description: URL to Brand 4oD feed, if available

dc:relation.programmeId.description: Indicates the contract and programme numbers

dc:relation.RelatedEntryId.description: The episode guide entry related to this episode

dc:date.TXDate.description: First TX date information for this episode

dc:relation.TXChannel.description: First TX channel information for this episode

dc:relation.Subtitles.description: Boolean indicating if subtitles are available for this episode

dc:relation.AudioDescription.description: Boolean indicating if an audio description is available for this episode

dc:relation.LoginRequired.description: Boolean indicating if the user has to be logged-in in order to play this episode.

dc:date.firstTXDate.description: First TX date information for this episode

dc:relation.ParentCollectionId.description: The ID of the Parent Collection where the resource is assigned to.

dc:relation.TotalResults.description: Number of entries what match the search-term

title.description: Episode Title. If available on 4oD then the 4oD episode title is returned. If not, then the title attributed to the slot is returned. It is possible for these to be different

dcterms:available.description: Start date, end date and date / time format for the period of time when episode is available on 4oD. This element is not returned if the programme is not currently available on 4oD.

dc:relation.SeriesNumber.description: The series to which this episode belongs.

dc:relation.EpisodeNumber.description: The episode number within the series.

dc:relation.AgeRating.description: Channel 4-specific recommended lower age-limit for viewers (0, 16 or 18)

dc:relation.Guidance.description: Channel 4-specific warning text about specific disturbing content, adult humour, nudity, etc., if applicable

dc:date.TXDate.description: If this programme is available on 4oD then this element indicates the broadcast date/time of the episode selected for 4oD. If the programme is not on 4oD then this element is omitted.(Indicates whether pre- or post-watershed)

dc:relation.TXChannel.description: If this programme is available on 4oD then this element indicates the broadcast channel that the episode selected for 4oD. If the programme is not on 4oD then this element is omitted.

dc:relation.Subtitles.description: Boolean indicating if subtitles are available for this episode

dc:relation.AudioDescription.description: Boolean indicating if an audio description is available for this episode

dc:relation.Duration.description: Length in minutes and seconds - does not include ad breaks

link@alternate.description: URL to HTML version of episode (if available)

link@related.description: URL of ATOM feed of current episode

media:player.description: URL to 4oD media-player version of episode (if available)

media:thumbnail.description: URL to 4oD medium-sized image of this episode (if available)

media:rating.description: Flag to show whether the 4oD version of the episode is suitable for adults only ("adult") or for all viewers ("nonadult") (if available)

media:copyright.description: Link to 4oD  copyright / T&C information (if available)

media:restriction.description: Restriction flag ("allow") and list of country or state codes where 4oD episode is accessible to website users (if available)

media:rights.description: Status of 4oD media rights under which Channel 4 provides episode content (if available)

media:player.description: URL to media-player version of episode

media:thumbnail.description: URL to medium-sized image of this episode

media:rating.description: Flag to show whether episode is suitable for adults only ("adult") or for all viewers ("nonadult")

media:restriction.description: Restriction flag ("allow") and list of country or state codes where episode is accessible to website users

media:rights.description: Status of media rights under which Channel 4 provides episode content

dc:relation.deliveryType.description: Indicates STREAMING or FOR DOWNLOAD content

dcterms:available.description: Start date, end date and date/time format for the period of time when episode is available.  (This feed would not be available if the current date is outside the start and end dates.)

dc:relation.AgeRating.description: Channel 4-specific recommended lower age-limit for viewers (0, 16 or 18)

dc:relation.Guidance.description: Channel 4-specific warning text about specific disturbing content, adult humour, nudity, etc., if applicable

dc:relation.Subtitles.description: Boolean indicating if subtitles are available for this episode

dc:relation.AudioDescription.description: Boolean indicating if an audio description is available for this episode

dc:relation.Duration.description: Length in minutes and seconds - does not include ad breaks

media:category.description: Defines the type of short-form item.

dc:relation.ProgrammeType.description: Displays metadata code (as detailed in the following table) in a meaningful way on the application according to the specified programme type.

dc:date.firstTXDate.description: First TX date information for this episode

dc:relation.firstTXChannel.description: First TX channel information for this episode

dc:date.slotTXDate.description: Current TX date information for this slot's episode

dc:relation.slotTXChannel.description: Current TX channel information for this slot's episode

link@self.description: URL to the Channel 4 XML feed for this brand

link@related (Episode Guide).description: URL to Episode Guide feed, if available

dc:relation.ExternalVideoId.description: This is the clip asset id (from column CLIP_ASSET.ASSET_ID. For the current implementation this is the Brightcove Id.

dc:relataion.BrandTitle.description: Title for the brand that the clip is associated with (directly or indirectly)

dc:relataion.BrandWebSafeTitle.description: Web-safe title for the brand that the clip is associated with (directly or indirectly)

dc:relation.RelatedEntryId.description: The episode guide entry related to this episode

dc:relation.LoginRequired.description: Boolean indicating if the requestType is ARCHIVE and the user needs to be logged in to watch.

media:thumbnail.description: URL to medium-sized image of this brand

media:credit.description: List of credits/cast for the episode

link@related (4oD).description: URL to 4oD feed, if available (self-referential in 4oD feeds)

link@related (Clips).description: URL to short-form video feed, if available

dc:relation.Repeat.description: Boolean indicating if the Slot includes an indicator marked as repeat.

dc:date.Last.description: Timestamp of the previous TX from this brand (if applicable)

dc:relation.LastChannel.description: The channel on which the previous TX from this brand(if applicable)

dc:date.Next.description: Timestamp of the next TX from this brand (if applicable)

dc:relation.NextChannel.description: The channel on which the next TX from this brand (if applicable)

dc:relation.TXStartTime.description: Start date and time of the broadcast

dc:relation.BrandWebSafeTitle.description: Programme's Brand name in Web safe format

media:thumbnail.description: URL to medium-sized image of this brand

link@related (Official Site).description: URL to the brand's official site, if available

link@related (All Programmes by Title).description: All programmes in category by title

link@related (4oD Programmes by TX Date).description: 4oD programmes in category by TX date

dc:relation.CategoryType.description: Type to which the category belongs (if applicable). (Valid values are 'Channel', 'Display' or 'None'.)

dc:relation.CategoryOrder.description: Enumerated order of category within its type (e.g., 'Channel' might have Food=1, More4=2, etc.) (Appears in feed only if CategoryType<>'None'.)

dc:relation.AllProgrammeCount.description: Number of available brands in this category (all programmes)

dc:relation.4oDProgrammeCount.description: The number of 4oD available programmes in the collection, including all Brand/Series/Episodes.

generator.description: Identifies the agent used to generate the feed

generator@version.description: Identifies the version of the agent used to generate the feed

dc:relation.platformClientVersion.description: Identifies the version of the client application compatible with this feed.

link@relative (Official Site).description: URL to the brand's official site, if available

link@relative (4oD).description: URL to 4oD feed, if available (self-referential in 4oD feeds)

link@relative (Clips).description: URL to short-form video feed, if available

link@relative (Episode Guide).description: URL to Episode Guide feed, if available

media:thumbnail.description: URL to medium sized image of this series

Link@Related title=\"Episode Guide\".description: URL to brand episode guide feed

Link@Related title=\"4oD\".description: URL to Brand 4oD feed, if available

dc:relation.ParentCollectionId.description: The ID of the Parent Collection where the resource is assigned to.

dc:relation.WideScreen.description: Boolean value is true if widescreen slot_indicator exists for this slot, otherwise false

dc:relation.Signing.description: Boolean value is true if signing slot_indicator exists for this slot, otherwise false.

html.description: URL to HTML version of brand (if available)

atom+xml.description: URL of ATOM feed of current brand

link@rel=related@title=4oD.description: URL of ATOM 4oD feed of current brand (if available)

link@rel=related@title=Clips.description: URL of ATOM Clips feed of current brand (if available)

link@rel=related@title=Episode Guide.description: URL of ATOM Episode Guide details feed of current brand (if available)

dc:relation.SimulcastRights.description: Boolean indicating if the episode has rights to be streamed on the live simulcast service.

dc:relation.Platform.description: The platform code that this episode is available on

dc:relation.Movie.description: Boolean indicating if the SLOT is a Movie or not.

dc:relation.comingSoonTo4oD.description: If the brand is coming to be available on 4oD soon this empty element should be included.

dc:relation.hd.description: Boolean indicating if the SLOT is HD on linear
